attributes.action: Reverse a decision of BREXIT. Rejoin EU. Make new votings.
attributes.background: Reverse a decision of BREXIT. Rejoin EU. Millions of Britains want to Rejoin EU. We have gone well behind because of the wrong decision of leaving EU in terms of many things. Britains want everything back for better future. One wrong decision of leaving EU should not decide BRITAIN FUTURE.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Apply to Rejoin the EU as soon as possible to increase growth in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749128

Commit to a referendum in May 2028 asking the next government to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747385
